entry.tran: (故事或其标注)警戒的，警世的
entry.def: A cautionary story or a cautionary note to a story is one that is intended to give a warning to people.

example.ex: Barely fifteen months later, it has become a cautionary tale of the pitfalls of international mergers and acquisitions...
example.tran: 不过15个月，它就成了告诫人们留心跨国并购中陷阱的警世故事。

example.ex: An editorial in The Times sounds a cautionary note.
example.tran: 《泰晤士报》的一篇社论读起来颇有警诫意味。

sentences.sentence: "the swastika...a very ancient prophylactic symbol occurring among all peoples"- Victor Schultze
